column5: Well.. I might be shopping around to replace my kicker.. I spoke to Percher about a place.. I might get that one.. but just want to see if they got any good deals down at the show for a kicker.. looking at long shaft, 4-5hp?  oh yeah.. I gotta bug someone about this too... (i'll find you on msn).. thanks   Thanks Kevin
check this out might be what you need http://toronto.kijiji.ca/c-cars-vehicles-b...QQAdIdZ35181104
Good luck with your search Kevin.I hope you find  a good deal.Just take your time and dont be in a hurry there is still lots of time untill the soft water season. Dan

Kevin, I went looking at the show for a 9.9 and got a better deal when I got home and started calling around...it appears people find better boat package deals at the show than a "stand alone" motor. Good luck!

Try giving Captain's Marina a call.  They are located in Bewdley (Rice Lake) and just checking on their website today, they have a 98 Evinrude 9.9 motor for sale.  http://www.captainsmarina.com/index.php
